Meta.title: Custom Whatever Loader
Meta.author: DK
Meta.description:
[h1]Custom Whatever Loader[/h1]
Allows the game to load modders' custom Lang resources from mod folder.
Currently supports: [list] [*] Dialog/Drama [*] Text [/list]
New features are added on demand.
[h1]Localization[/h1]
[quote] Mod_MyCustomContent/ ├─ package.xml ├─ LangMod/ │ ├─ EN/ │ │ ├─ Dialog/ │ │ │ ├─ Drama/ │ │ │ │ ├─ my_custom_NPC.xlsx │ │ ├─ Text/ │ │ │ ├─ Book/ │ │ │ │ ├─ my_new_book.txt │ │ │ ├─ Scoll/ │ │ │ │ ├─ my_new_letter.txt │ ├─ JP/ │ │ ├─ <ibid>/ │ ├─ CN/ │ │ ├─ <ibid>/ [/quote]
You have to use [b]LangMod[/b] folder instead of [b]Lang[/b] otherwise game will duplicate entire translation tree into your mod folder.
[url=https://github.com/gottyduke/Elin.Plugins/tree/master/CustomDialogLoader]sauce[/url]
